Utilities¶

app.utils.create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: timedelta | None = None) → str[source]¶

Create JWT access token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – Data to encode into token.

  • expires_delta (Optional[timedelta], optional) – Expiry duration. Defaults to None.

Returns:

JWT access token.

Return type:

str

Get current user from JWT token.

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • token (str) – JWT token.

Raises:

HTTPException – Raised if credentials cannot be validated.

Returns:

User object.

Return type:

models.User

  • hashed_password (str) – Hashed password.
